item.title: Biotop X OpenCell
item.description: We just got back from London, where we helped our friends at [OpenCell] (http://opencell.webflow.io/) furnish their first container lab. How did this happen? Well, about a month ago we were contacted by Helene Steiner, who, together with Thomas Meany, is in the process of setting up a container village for small biotech startups in the heart of London. The idea is to provide a professional workspace (10 biolabs, 20 offices, 10 studios for artists and designers, 4 workshop containers, 1 store) to small businesses and startups.
